p: The resistance of the parasites to the classic antimalarial drugs has enormously motivated the prospection of new drugs, and metal-based compounds play an important role in this context. Strategies for the discovery and development of metal-based drugs are driven by the elucidation of the biological profile of the parasite and by the identification of therapeutic targets. Metalloantimalarials are considered very attractive new antimalaria agents as we will see in the following topics.
